title: Wild sorrel soup
ingredients: ['450g wild sorrel leaves', '300g lettuce leaves', '2 tablespoons chervil, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', '600ml milk', '1 dessertspoon brown sugar', '600ml chicken stock', '1 egg, beaten', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'croutons, for garnish']
